main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial phenomena (UAP) in Hollywood, California in July 1955 were reported and recorded by the U.S. Air Force through Project Blue Book.
interesting points: Sightings included a yellowish glowing light with the shape of a large egg, old grayish hue, which moved slowly and steadily toward the west before disappearing downward behind hills.
One of the sightings reported the UAP as a sound with three wills and half green, and the observation lasted for 10 minutes.
Another sighting reported a visual ground observation of a meteor in Hollywood, California and the UAP was observed for 30 hours.
Some of the sightings were not reported until years after the actual events, raising questions about the delay in reporting.
Questionnaire pages were included in the report, seeking detailed information on the observed objects, such as their appearance, behavior, and the circumstances of each sighting.
